content: row 1 in white only rs kfb knit to last 2 stitches k2 decrease row 2 in white only ws knit to last 2 stitches kfb knit 1 repeat row 1 and 2 in white cut white yarn and switch to red yarn weave the ends in as you go there s tons of videos on youtube row 5 in red only rs kfb knit to last 2 stitches k2 decrease row 6 in red only ws knit to last 2 stitches kfb knit 1 repeat row 1 and 2 in red repeat pattern above until desired length or until 62 total stripes 31 in each color 70 inches long bind off on 4th row of red on the wrong side for more check out our website and our newsletter https //www craftivist net or join our facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/craftivist net/ follow us at instagram and please tag us on shared pictures https //www instagram com/craftivistgram/ and join our ravelry group http //www ravelry com/groups/craftivist feel free to sell items or post pictures made from this pattern please give credit to craftivist elizabeth sovern 3 4
